body.name: YONILL Dust Pans with Long Handle - Metal Upright Dustpan Heavy Duty, 35" Long Handled Stand Up Dustpans for Lobby, Garage, Home and Yard (Dustpan only)

features: Heavy Duty Dust Pans: The standing dustpan is manufactured by an integrated forming process, without any cracks, which means it is enough durable to hold up more heavier rubbish. After testing, it can bear the weight up to 26 lbs.

Metal Stainless Steel Material: The stainless steel dust pan is better than plastic dust pan, metal material is more durable and has longer service life for daily use, also the edge doesn't chip or bend while using.

Easy to Install: Dustpans with handle is 35" in height. Long handled design that means don't need bend your waist. It with the perfect 10" width that suitable for use with most broom. 30s simple installation without any tools.
Multi Occasion Use: The upright dust pans is ideal for indoor/outdoor use. Easy to storage, don't take up space, perfect for house, office, lobby, balcony, garage and hotel.

100% Satisfication on YONILL: Package includes a dustpan and 3 stainless steel poles. If you have any problem with product, please feel free to contact us. Any quality problem, you will get the replacement or full refund.
body.description: YONILL Metal Dustpan with Long Handle YONILL upright dustpan is ideal for inside and outside use. Made of high-quality metal stainless steel, durable and sturdy. Perfect heavy duty dust pans for commercial, house, office, lobby, balcony, garage and hotel. Product Specification Material: Stainless Steel + PlasticColor: Siliver + Blue

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Dimensions Height: 35 inches Width: 10 inches Length: 10 inches Weight: 1.27 lbs YONILL Metal Dustpan with Long Handle YONILL upright dustpan is ideal for inside and outside use. Made of high-quality metal stainless steel, durable and sturdy. Perfect heavy duty dust pans for commercial, house, office, lobby, balcony, garage and hotel. Product Specification Material: Stainless Steel + PlasticColor: Siliver + Blue

Integrated Design The dustpan is designed in an integrated process, not spliced, without any gap. 360 degree without sharp angle, preventing scratching during use. Heavy Duty Upright Dustpans Stand up dustpans are ideal for indoor outdoor use. With 3 poles, total height is 35 inch, no bending while doing housework. The heavy duty dustpan can bear the weight up to 26 lbs. Sturdy and Durable Metal Dust pan is made of stainless steel material. Compared with the plastic dustpan, this dustpan doesn't rust and fade, with smooth surface that doesn't stick debris. Sturdy and durable for long time use.

Fits the Floor Seamlessly The mouth of the dust pan adopts the integrated stainless steel that fits the floor seamlessly. Great for debris to be swept into the dustpan, for maximum dust and dirt collection. Buckle Design The metal dustpan handle with a buckle that great to hold most broom handle. After cleaning, you can buckle your broom on the dustpan, easy to store and don't take up any space. Package Include 3 x Stainless Steel Pole 2 x Screw 1 x Dustpan 1 x Handle
Indoor Angel Broom Grout Brush Floor Scrub Brush Floor Squeegee Dustpan Broom Set Long Handle ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a very good product. I like it because I have knee surgery and I can’t bend down to pick up the trash so this work perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan is terrific! Now that I'm old and wise, I only buy metal dust pans. But it's getting very hazardous to bend all the way down to the floor. This thing works great and will last me for years to come! I found the perfect small broom that fits in the handle clip. I'm super happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of room
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan was an easy assemble. The hole where the handle went through the pan was bent a little, but easily bent back in place and easily assembled. I REALLY like the amount af debris you can collect in the pan. Much better than the enclosed type that restricts the amount of trash. A broom also easily attaches to the handle and stands on its own. The aluminum is fairly thin. So you should just be careful not to step on it or otherwise bend it, as I think it could get deformed. Other than that, I really like it and it has made picking up dust and debris almost enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why is the brook bigger than the dust pan
reviews.reviewText: Product works great, i recently ran over my plastic dustpan/broom combo. So decided to get a metal one. I have never seen a set where the broom is bigger than the dust pan. Dust pan is too small. But all this was disclosed, I just didn’t see it. So 5 stars for the product, 0 stars for the designer and 0 starts for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our cheap dustpan finally died...
reviews.reviewText: ...this is easy to use, sturdy & lightweight. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s cheap and feels like it
reviews.reviewText: Ok, it’s a dustpan. It’s functional. It’s light weight and easy to carry around. But the pole and the screw connector feels flimsy. Not sure how durable the unit will be. At best it’s ok, but I’d buy a sturdier item even if it was more expensive. Bottom line is that it works for now, and for what I paid for it, it will do what it needs to. But I wouldn’t purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Seems to be pretty durable.
reviews.reviewText: It's just what i needed. I'm having my R knee replaced and thought this would help me keep the place ship shape after all the caregivers have flown the coop. To install the k-nut, i carefully balanced it on my index finger, inserted it inside the metal pole while lining it up with the hole and put in the screw. It was easier than i initially thought it would be. And, because it's all stainless, i'm guessin' it'll last quite a good while.

El mejor recogedor que he usado en mi corta pero larga vida. Vale la pena porque facilita muchísimo la limpieza al ser tan pegado al piso. Además el mango te apoya a no agacharte mucho para gente alta.
